(:action obtain ; Obtain a resource and update possession status
 :parameters (?p - agent ?item - object)
 :precondition (and (at ?item location) (not (inventory ?p ?item)))
 :effect (and (inventory ?p ?item) (not (at ?item location))

(:action kneel ; Kneel and perform a task on an item
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?surface - surface)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?surface) (inventory ?p ?item) (stained ?surface))
  :effect (and (clean ?surface) (not (stained ?surface))

(:action rub ; Perform a cleaning action to transform the state of an object
    :parameters (?agent - person ?tool - object ?target - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (inventory ?agent ?tool) (needs_cleaning ?target))
    :effect (and (clean ?target) (not (needs_cleaning ?target))
